field.label: Enable
field.help: Enable or disable ARP/NDP Logging. This will not automatically enable any mail notifications, see notes below

field.label: Protocols
field.help: Select the protocols you want to watch

field.label: Interfaces
field.help: Leave empty to track on all interfaces or add the interfaces you want to track

field.label: Suppress MAC address
field.help:
Add MAC addresses you want to exclude from the notifications in the following format: xx:xx:xx:xx:xx
The firewall MAC addresses are already excluded

field.label: Log new MAC/IP address entries
field.help: Enable or disable the logging of new entries

field.label: Log MAC address changes
field.help: Enable or disable the logging of MAC address changes (helps to find duplicates or spoofing)

field.label: Log IPv4 address changes
field.help: Enable or disable the logging of IPv4 address changes

field.label: Log IPv6 address changes
field.help: Enable or disable the logging of IPv6 address changes

field.label: Log hostname changes
field.help: Enable or disable the logging of hostname changes

field.label: Log interface changes
field.help: Enable or disable the logging of interface changes

field.label: Retention
field.help: After how many days should an inactive MAC address be deleted from the database? After this period the device is recognized as new
